title: A New World Awaits
alternative_title: A New World Awaits You! ; Alternative Worlds
status: A New World Awaits You! ; Alternative Worlds
description:
Description :
        Some are chosen by the 3 guardians of the Universe that protect the balance of all worlds and to stop a great evil. These soon to be heroes are selected from different worlds and are gifted supernatural abilities and unique weapons to fight of The god of all evil and his force and take back the keystones which hold the source and balance of worlds.
